name: HV_ORDER_PROC
description: This table contains data on order procedures related to a hospital visit.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: DISCR_FREQ_ID
columns.description: The discrete frequency associated with the order.

columns.name: DISCR_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_C_NAME
columns.description: Determines how the patient associated with this order is to be transported.

columns.name: ORD_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the ordering provider.

columns.name: STAND_CNT
columns.description: The standing count for the order.

columns.name: STND_TP_C_NAME
columns.description: The standing count type for the order (i.e. days, weeks, etc.)

columns.name: ADM_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The admission department associated with the order.

columns.name: ADMIT_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The admission service associated with the order.

columns.name: ADM_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The admission level of care associated with the order.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_ID
columns.description: The admission diagnosis associated with the order.

columns.name: ADM_COND_C_NAME
columns.description: The admission condition associated with the order.

columns.name: ADMIT_LEN_STAY
columns.description: The admission expected length of stay.

columns.name: ADMIT_DISCHG_DATE
columns.description: The admission expected date of discharge.

columns.name: ADMIT_RES_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the senior admitting resident.

columns.name: ADM_INTRN_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the admitting intern.

columns.name: EXP_ADMIT_DT
columns.description: The expected admission date.

columns.name: TF_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The transfer department associated with the order.

columns.name: TRANFER_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description: The service associated with the transfer department.

columns.name: TF_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The transfer level of care associated with the order.

columns.name: TRANFER_DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis ID associated with the transfer order.

columns.name: TRANFER_COND_C_NAME
columns.description: The condition specified with the transfer order.

columns.name: TRANFER_LEN_STAY
columns.description: The expected length of stay associated with the transfer order.

columns.name: TRANFER_DISCHR_DT
columns.description: The expected discharge date associated with the transfer order.

columns.name: TRANFER_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the admitting provider.

columns.name: DCHRG_EXP_TIME
columns.description: The expected discharge date and time associated with the discharge order.

columns.name: DISCH_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description: The discharge disposition associated with the discharge order.

columns.name: DISCH_DEST_C_NAME
columns.description: The discharge destination associated with the discharge order.

columns.name: ISOLATION_C_NAME
columns.description: The isolation status of the patient associated with the order.

columns.name: CODESTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The code status of the patient associated with the order.

columns.name: DIET_C_NAME
columns.description: The diet status of the patient associated with the order.

columns.name: INST_OF_UPDATE_TM
columns.description: The day and time the order record was last updated.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: The effective date and time of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_PAT_CLS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient class of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description: The service of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_ACCOM_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: The accommodation code of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_ACCOM_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The accommodation reason of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The level of care of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason for change of the patient update that should be generated from this order.

columns.name: CONSULTANT_ID
columns.description: Stores the Lead Consultant entered by the user during order entry for transfer and patient update orders.

columns.name: LEAVE_OF_ABSENCE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the reason that the patient is to go on leave from the current admission. This column is only likely to be populated for Leave of Absence orders.

columns.name: LEAVE_OF_ABSENCE_LEAVE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the patient is expected to go out on leave. This column is only likely to be populated for Leave of Absence orders.

columns.name: LEAVE_OF_ABSENCE_RETURN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the patient is expected to return from leave. This column is only likely to be populated for Leave of Absence orders.

columns.name: LEAVE_OF_ABSENCE_HOLD_BED_YN
columns.description: Whether or not the patient's current bed should be held during the upcoming leave. This column is only likely to be populated for Leave of Absence orders.

columns.name: DCHRG_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The expected discharge date associated with the discharge order.

columns.name: TRANSFER_REQUEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of transfer request being ordered.

columns.name: ADT_PATIENT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Patient class used for transfer request orders.

columns.name: HOSP_AREA_ID
columns.description: Hospital area to request a patient transfer.

columns.name: TRANSFER_CENTER_REGION_ID
columns.description: Stores the Transfer Center region.

columns.name: TRANSFER_CENTER_REGION_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: CODE_STATUS_COMMENTS
columns.description: The code status comments associated with the order.

columns.name: EXP_DIS_APPROX_TM_C_NAME
columns.description: The approximate expected discharge time category ID for the order.
